name: In Development
description: Work is not finished and therefore not ready for a formal review.

name: Ready For Code Review
description: Indicates the PR is ready for a review.

name: Ready For Feature Review
description: Indicates the PR is ready for a review.

name: Ready For QA
description: Indicates the PR is ready for a review.

name: Ready For External FR
description: Indicates the PR is ready for a review.

name: Ready For External QA
description: Indicates the PR is ready for a review.

name: Release Tied To Other Repo
description: Indicates a PR needs to be released along with a PR in another repo.

name: Unmerged Dependency In Other Repo
description: Indicates a dependency must be merged and released before.

name: As Its Own Release
description: Indicates to the Release Manager this PR requires extensive testing and may require follow-up fixes.

name: Must Go In Next Release
description: This is high priority and must go in next release.

name: Site-Locale Specific
description: Indicates the changeset only affects a specific Site or Locale, faster to be tested in a release.

name: Merge - Test After 3PM EST
description: Indicates to the Release Manager that testing from a team in a different timezone is required.

name: Do Not Merge
description: Do not merge a PR tagged with this label.

name: STAMP
description: Indicates this is a STAMP specific feature.

name: Needs Visual Regression
description: Indicates that a quick smoke test on a specific feature is required.

name: Needs Full Regression
description: Indicates a Full Regression is needed for the service/application.

name: In Code Review
description: Indicates this PR\'s review is in progress.

name: In Feature Review
description: Indicates this PR\'s review is in progress.

name: In QA
description: Indicates this PR\'s review is in progress.

name: Unaddressed Comments
description: Indicates there are Unaddressed Comments from 1 or more of the reviewers.

name: Comments Addressed
description: Indicates all comments have been addressed after a review round.

name: Passed Code Review
description: Indicates a successful review.

name: Passed Feature Review
description: Indicates a successful review.

name: Passed QA
description: Indicates a successful review.

name: Passed External FR
description: Indicates a successful review.

name: Passed External QA
description: Indicates a successful review.

name: Ready To Merge
description: Indicates the Pull Request has passed all needed reviews.

name: Needs Rebase
description: A conflict with the base branch or a dependency has been merged.

name: Pending Travis
description: A conflict or dependency has been resolved and will be ready after the current build finishes

name: Verified In Stage
description: Indicates the Pull Request has been tested and confirmed on Stage.
